full_summary:
**Government Tender Notice: Multi-disciplinary Architectural and Engineering Consultant Services**

**Reference Number:** MX-42951451324
**Amendment Number:** 6
**Solicitation Number:** PRO23SL1_81151
**Publication Date:** November 22, 2023
**Tender Closing Date and Time:** January 23, 2024, 14:00 PST
**Expected Contract Start Date:** N/A
**Expected Contract End Date:** N/A
**Tender Status:** Expired
**Trade Agreements:** Provision applies to Canadian companies with no trade restrictions.

**Description:**

Defence Construction Canada is seeking to establish a multi-disciplinary Source List for architectural and engineering consultant services in various locations in British Columbia. The successful candidates will be required to provide expert advice as and when required. The Source List will be for a period of three years with an estimated maximum value of $15,000,000. The maximum value of each commission is $350,000.

To be considered, companies must submit an abbreviated proposal through the MERX Electronic Bidding System by the deadline. Interested candidates are encouraged to address their questions to the designated contact person.

**Key Requirements:**

* The appointed consultant must possess a valid DOS issued by the Contract Security Program (CSP) within Public Services and Procurement Canada.
* Candidates must demonstrate capability to provide deliverables in English and French.
* Companies with trade agreements including the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), and Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA) are eligible.

**Required Labour Categories:**

* Senior Mechanical Engineer
* Intermediate Mechanical Engineer
* Senior Electrical Engineer
* Intermediate Electrical Engineer
* Senior Structural Engineer
* Intermediate Structural Engineer
* Senior Civil Engineer
* Intermediate Civil Engineer
* Architect - Senior
* Architect - Intermediate
* Senior Technologist/Technical Support
* Intermediate Technologist/Technical Support
* Total Classification Rate
* Maximum Upset Unit Travel Rates to various locations

**How to Participate:**

Companies interested in participating must submit their proposals through the MERX Electronic Bidding System at the following link: [https://www.merx.com/public/solicitations/2676713714/abstract?language=EN](https://www.merx.com/public/solicitations/2676713714/abstract?language=EN)
